meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of excrement.
meanings.sent1: The excremental smell filled the room, making everyone cover their noses.
meanings.sent2: The dirty alley had an excremental appearance, with trash scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The excremental odor was so strong that even the flies avoided it.
meanings.sent4: The excremental nature of the situation made it hard to ignore the mess.
meanings.sent5: The excremental characteristics of the sewer system were evident in the foul stench.

meanings.sent1: The excremental substance on the floor was a clear sign of neglect.
meanings.sent2: The excremental texture of the mud made it hard to clean off the shoes.
meanings.sent3: The excremental appearance of the chocolate cake fooled everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The excremental color of the paint gave the walls a dirty look.
meanings.sent5: The excremental content of the garbage bin attracted unwanted pests.
